summary.summary_text: Everyone met at dawn at Speaker's request. Speaker will introduce Don and talk about the agenda items. Speakers will talk about getting good quality close talking mics on every speaker and post-processing the waveforms to give them better recognition. NIST folks are coming by next week and they'll talk about that.
